title: Scheduled Game Update - November 15, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled game update on Wednesday, November 15, 2023 at 5:00 AM PST (8:00 AM EST / 2:00 PM CET / 12:00 AM AEDT).

title: What's Your MapleStory? - Skywired
content: We take a look at some of the great stories that our players have had with MapleStory over the years!

title: Community Livestream - v.246 Update Preview
content: Join Community Manager Veeraah and some special guests in the next Community Livestream as they preview the upcoming events and contents in v.246 New Age: 6th Job

title: Community Livestream - Sixth Star Showdown w/ Team Yeti!
content: Join Community Manager Veeraah alongside Team Yeti from the Sixth Star Showdown event in a Community Livestream!

title: Cash Shop Update for November 8
content: Premium Surprise Style Box and more!

title: Check Out the November 2023 Art Corner
content: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!
